data.content: Hi, this is a new Netology!Once upon a time, Netology began with online marketing initiatives.Then there were courses in design, development, analytics and management.We grow ourselves and help students grow: from beginners to confident professionals.But the most important thing remains with us: we believe, which makes us want more, aim higher, run faster. Our mission is to help us embark on the path of growth and start a chain of changes -> https://netology.ru/
